### Works across the data pipeline:

<ul style="font-size:20px; line-height:24px">
  <li><b>Data Retrieval/Migration</b>: csv, json, xml, sql formats, ETL handling and API integration</li>
  <li><b>Data Merging/Reshaping</b>: long/wide structures, time series/panel, group/category setup</li>
  <li><b>Data Cleaning/Munging/Wrangling</b>: cleaning numeric/dates, handling missings, assigning conditional values</li>
  <li><b>Data Calculation/Aggregation/Modeling</b>: summary statistics, distribution, correlations, linear/non-linear modeling</li>
  <li><b>Data Visualization/Reporting</b>: point/line/bar charts, HTML/PDF outputs, Jupyter/RMarkdown notebooks, Shiny/Flask apps</li>
  <li><b>Data Archival/Storage</b>: data warehousing, relational databases, FTP and cloud computing storage</li>
</ul>
